full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG GRUB PA'I RGYAL MO LUGS KYI TSE DPAG MED LA BRTEN NAS BRTAN BZHUGS 'BUL TSUL GYI CHOG BSGRIGS SRA MKHREGS RDO RJE'I SROG SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @041A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI DRUNG YIG TSANGS SKYES BLO LDAN DANG, PHU BO RTZE GNYER BLO BZANG DNGOS GRUB SPUN GYIS MCHOD YON LA RING 'CHO'I RTEN 'BYUNG BSGRIG 'DUN SKABS, TSE DPAG MED KYI RIGS SHIG LA BRTEN PA'I ZHABS BRTAN 'BUL CHOG GSANG SGRIGS SHIG BYUD NA LEGS TSUL SRID SKYONG SDE BAR ZHUS 'DUG DON LTAR, GRUB RGYAL LUGS DANG 'BREL BAR KUN MKHYEN LNGA PAS STZAL BA'I SGROL DKAR GYI BRTAN BZHUGS CHOG BSGRIGS DANG, DENG SANG PHYAG LEN RGYU GYI YI GE SOGS LA GZHI BYAS TE 'GAL MED KHYER BDE BA'I LUGS SU SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS MKHAN BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS PHO BRANG RI BOGRU 'DZIN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI ZHA LU MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG YON TAN 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
